description:
Executes a rename operation, applying changes to the workspace.

Must use a rename_id from a previous preview to ensure
the same changes are applied. Supports excluding specific files or glob patterns.

rename_id.description: Required ID from a previous preview to apply
rename_id.title: Rename Id

exclude_files.description: List of file paths or glob patterns to exclude from the rename operation
exclude_files.title: Exclude Files

title: RenameExecuteRequest
